Review: A superb turn based strategy game that I've lost too many hours in.  The multiplayer is full of additional games in the style of what once was found in the Battle.net arena, player made mods that allow for whole new games from fairly basic foot (of winged) races to tower defense modes, MOBA like DotA and LoL, zombie horde defense holdout games in competitive and co-operative varieties.  An easy recommendation for any fan of strategy games. Oh, and it's open source, so no corporation can destroy it or take it away!
Playtime: 78.8 hrs on record																					(50.3 hrs at review time)

Review: This game is amazing.  It makes you laugh while engrossing you in the 'one more turn' strategy.  Becoming a Glorious Leader is a solid recommendation for anyone who ever enjoyed a strategy game. I didn't even know I wanted this game.  It's so much more than I thought it would be.  So many other games smoothly combined into one here.

Review: I am not a fan of horror games but after just a few matches this won me over handily.  The suspense and chase is amazing, and in the end it's a game where everyone has fun.  Akin to an interactive horror experience where your opponent is not some AI, but actual human beings.  Highly recommended that you play both the survivor and the killer, as you learn so much about how the other works and can enjoy the two differing unique experiences.

Review: I am the very model of a shadowrunning samurai; I've razorclaws and dermal plates and target-sensing cybereyes. I know the gangs of Redmond and I ride a wizzer motorbike, I'm very well acquainted with a fixer known as Magic Mike. I may not hack the Matrix but I know just how to swing a blade, In such a way to guarantee my target simply won't evade. I understand unwritten rules of mercenary ettiquette... (ettiquette...) Like splitting loot or stealing kills or how Yakuza settle bets! I'm very good at cleaving skulls or stabbing things without a fuss, or taking trophies from awakened critters animalculous... In short you'll find no better suited member for your team than I, For I'm the very model of a shadowrunning samurai! I'll take the toughest missions, always eager to test out my skill, No matter the opponent, I can register another kill. I've made my reputation as a warrior decked out in chrome, I've worked for folks named Johnson breaking in to the Tacoma Dome. I'm stronger than a wendigo, with muscles cultured in a vat, My lungs can filter toxins and I've not an ounce of body fat, I'm swifter than a cheetah thanks to wired reflexology, (reflexology, hmm...) I'll get your decker in and out of Renraku Arcology! Then I can get the nuyen we were promised for the datasteal, I'd celebrate but essence loss has left me unable to feel. Don't bother even trying 'cause I'm never taken by surprise, I am the very model of a shadowrunning samurai! They never see me coming when I work to infiltrate a place, I move so fraggin' swiftly that you'd swear I thought it was a race. But if you see a cyber psycho coming at you like he's nuts, You'll never even realize I've already sliced out your guts. That's not to say that I don't have affinity for gunnery, I've got a smartlink Ingram that I use for long-range funnery, In short it doesn't matter if I'm using swords or pistolry (pistolry... aha!) You'll say my quarry never even stood a chance in history! So take me on your run because I'm plucky and adventury, More talented than anyone you'll hope to meet this century, If anyone says different then they're tellin' you a ♥♥♥♥♥♥♥♥ lie, 'Cause I'm the very model of a shadowrunning samurai!
Playtime: 5.8 hrs on record
